title: Bug 31627 - Core Dump on Perspective Change after Adding DBCS Project
description:
Language: Japanese
Build driver: eclipseSDKI20030211linuxgtk
OS: RedHat8 (Japanese: locale jaJP.eucJP), gtk 2.2
JDK Ver.: IBM JDK1.3.1 + SR3
Summary: DBCS: Perspective change caused core dump after adding DBCS project to the workspace

Description:
Steps to recreate problem:
1. Open Eclipse with the specified configurations.
2. Add a DBCS project to the workspace.
3. Click the 'Resource Perspective' icon at the shortcut bar.
<<Error
After step 3, the workbench crashes and core dumps.
Please refer to the attachment (cvsdefect.zip)

<<Expected Result
The perspective should change successfully without any core dump.
OB: After adding a DBCS project to the workspace, changing the perspective results in a workbench crash and core dump.
EB: Upon clicking the 'Resource Perspective' icon, the perspective change should occur smoothly without any workbench crash or core dump.
SR:
1. Open Eclipse with specified configurations.
2. Add a DBCS project to the workspace.
3. Click the 'Resource Perspective' icon.
Expected Result: Perspective change should occur without causing a workbench crash or core dump.
